metadata.name: The Message 2006 AD
metadata.description: An extraordinary, spiritual masterpiece, impossible to replicate, and the only one of its kind in existence. The image appeared miraculously in 2006, within a personal collection of digital photos. What was thought to be an accidental, blurred photo, turned out to be a phenomenal visual expression of the Holy Trinity and more. The Virgin Mary holding the Baby Jesus, a deceased Jesus in Maryâ€™s arms following the Crucifixion, the Dove as a Sign of the Holy Spirit soaring above, while the Spirits come together to form a single image of a person in prayer with the Hand of God touching upon the head. Words alone cannot capture all that is on display within this beautiful and astonishing NFT. A simple, yet miraculous message from God. That the Father, Son, The Holy Spirit, and The Virgin Mary are with us.
